description:
A little goes a long way with this super concentrated wash. Gentle enough to use on skin but strong enough for dishes and laundry.

  • Packable, leak-proof bottle
  • Biodegradable and compostable (still, practice Leave No Trace and please wash well away from waterways)
  • Phosphate and paraben free
  • Safe for personal use, pots, pans, clothes or any outdoor gear
  • Super-thick concentrated formula
name: Sea To Summit Super Concentrated Wilderness Wash 250ml

specs.key: Suitable for use in salt water
